thread.title: Report: Andrew Luck limited in practice, 'legitimately questionable'
thread.title_full: Report: Andrew Luck limited in practice, 'legitimately questionable' - CBSSports.com

author: Will Brinson
title: Report: Andrew Luck limited in practice, 'legitimately questionable'
text:
Colts Nation is holding its breath on Andrew Luck 's shoulder injury.

The latest from SportsLine Week 4 NFL Picks 

Luck tried to assuage everyone on Wednesday when he sounded confident after being limited during practice. He was limited again Thursday and now, according to Adam Schefter of ESPN , Luck is "legitimately questionable" to play against the Jaguars on Sunday. 
One concern for the Colts? They've got two games in less than a week, both divisional. After Jacksonville on Sunday the Colts draw the Texans on Thursday Night Football . 
Per Schefter, it's "unlikely Luck throws much, or at all, before Sunday."
All of this means Luck is a legit game-time decision. Which means Matt Hasselbeck might end up getting a start against Jacksonville. 

Luck was limited in practice Wednesday. (USATSI) 

Topics: Andrew Luck , Matt Hasselbeck , Will Brinson , Houston Texans , Indianapolis Colts , Jacksonville Jaguars , NFL
